title: Bitcoin And Ethereum Now Accepted At Whole Foods, Nordstrom And Other Retailers
text: A brand new payment app called Flexa launched on Monday that will facilitate the use of bitcoin and other popular cryptocurrencies at a wide range of retail locations, including Amazon.com, Inc.

title: USPS' Sad Song Continues: Billion-Dollar Losses, Mail Weakness Offsets Parcel Gains
text: For the U.S. Postal Service, the story remained much the same in its fiscal 2019 second quarter as its been for many prior quarters â€“ gains in shipping and package revenue offset by declines in first class and marketing mail, flat to down total revenue and net losses measured in the billions of dollars.

title: Slack just released its updated financials ahead of its big pitch to investors
text: Direct messaging service Slack is expected to go public later this year with a direct listing on the NYSE.

title: Beyond Meat rival Impossible Foods raises another $300 million
text: Impossible Foods, which makes the bleeding plant-based Impossible Burger, has raised $300 million in its latest funding round.

title: Dow futures off nearly 500 points as China retaliates on tariffs
text: U.S. stock-index futures added to sharp losses Monday, pointing to an ugly start for Wall Street, after news reports said China will raise tariffs on some U.S. goods beginning June 1.

title: China is raising tariffs on $60 billion of US goods starting June 1
text: The move follows President Donald Trump's decision to hike tariffs on $200 billion in Chinese goods.

title: Taiwan's Foxconn readies chip boss to succeed Gou as chairman: sources
text: Foxconn is poised to nominate chip unit boss Liu Young to succeed Terry Gou as chairman in a surprise choice by the iPhone assembler, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said.

title: BlackRock pullout makes state role in Carige rescue more plausible: Moody's
text: The decision of U.S. asset manager BlackRock to pull out of the rescue of Italian troubled bank Carige makes state intervention more plausible, Moody's Investors Service said on Monday.

title: Stocks Fall, Dollar Climbs On Trade Talks Deadlock: Markets Wrap
text: U.S. equity futures slumped with Asian shares while European equities edged lower as investors awaited details on the countermeasures.

title: Asian stocks, yuan fall as Sino-U.S.trade war deepens; China retaliation eyed
text: U.S. stock futures and Asian shares fell on Monday on growing anxiety over whether the United States and China will be able to salvage a trade deal, after Washington sharply hiked tariffs and Beijing vowed to retaliate.

title: Exclusive: Bosch goes for platinum-light fuel cells
text: Global automotive supplier Bosch expects platinum to play only a minor role in its new fuel cells, giving precious metal markets scant benefit even as the technology gains momentum for pollution-free transport.

title: Euronext wins clearance from Norway government to buy Oslo Bors
text: European stock market operator Euronext said it had won clearance from Norway's Ministry of Finance to buy up to 100% of Oslo Bors, pushing Euronext closer to victory over Nasdaq in its bid to buy Oslo Bors.
